posts.post_content:
One of the most iconic of prewar cards.  It was clearly affixed to a scrapbook page at some point.

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.  :rolleyes:

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

What a great looking card at a great price, K. Should not last long.
Agreed. Nice card for the grade. GLWS.
